Detailed Description

Abstract class thath manage the generic flock entity.

Date:
dec 2007 - jul 2008
Version:
1.0

Parameters:

void FlockBase::setFlockItemActiveState ( SteerableEntity *  item,
bool  active 
)

Change the active flag of a spefied flock item. Activation/deactivation of a flock item must be excecuted thourougth this function, in order to update FlockBase::mActiveFlockItemsNumber.

Parameters:
<item> Reference to the item to whitch change the active flag.
<active> The active flag value .

void FlockBase::onUpdate ( const float  currentTime,
const float  elapsedTime 
) [virtual]

Update the flock position (average of items) and rendering status

Implements SteerableEntity.

void FlockBase::updateBehaviour ( const float  currentTime,
const float  elapsedTime 
) [virtual]

Update the flock behavior and a set of distribuited parameters, such as:

  • variance (flock space spread);
  • flock speed (average of items);
  • flock direction (average of items);
Moreover update the spatial database token and check for flock live conditions.

Implements SteerableEntity.

void FlockBase::onImpactWith ( SteerableEntity *  impacted,
float  impactWeight 
) [virtual]

Unused method.

Implements SteerableEntity.

void FlockBase::increaseImpctedFlockItemsNumber ( void   ) 

When a flock item impact anything then call this funtion. It check for wheather or not show big explosion, by countering the how many flock items have been impacted and is not exploding yet.

AVGroup (Abstract Vehicle Gruop - std::vector) containing the flock items.

int FlockBase::mActiveFlockItemsNumber [protected]

The number of active flock items

int FlockBase::mDamagedFlockItemsNumber [protected]

The number of damaged flock items. A flock item is damaged when its current energy less than 1/3 of the max energy value.

int FlockBase::mImpctedFlockItemsNumber [protected]

The number of flock items that have been impacted anything.

float FlockBase::mLastItemImpactTime [protected]

Manage the holding time for mImpctedFlockItemsNumber

float FlockBase::mBeforeImpactSpeed [protected]

Backups the speed befor the impact, because the impact reduct the speed.

Vector3 FlockBase::mBeforeImpactDirection [protected]

Backups the direction befor the impact, because the impact change the direction.

bool FlockBase::mOldHighLighted [protected]

Used for checking wheather the flock was highLighted

float FlockBase::variance [protected]

The flock space spread value.

SceneNode* FlockBase::mAreaNode [protected]

This node encapsulate the flock items. Its scale is proportional to the variance.

AxisAlignedBox FlockBase::mBoundary [protected]

The bounding box representing the flock boundary

ParticleSystem* FlockBase::mEnergyBurstEffect [protected]

Particle system for the energy attack effect

float FlockBase::minActiveItemsNumber [protected]

A flock have a minimun number of active flock. Under this threshold the flock is dead.

int FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateCounter [protected]

Behavior interation counter. Used for interleaved behavior update of the flock items. It range in [ 0, FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateRangeSize ]

float FlockBase::separationRadius

Flocking neighborhood influence. Used for the flocking behavior.

Separation permit the collision avoidance between the flock items.

This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::separationAngle

Flock items's view angle. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::separationWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::alignmentRadius

Flocking neighborhood influence. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::alignmentAngle

Flock items's view angle. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::alignmentWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::cohesionRadius

Flocking neighborhood influence. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::cohesionAngle

Flock items's view angle. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::cohesionWeight

Flock items's view angle. Used for the flocking behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::wanderAngle

Max steering angle for wandering. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::wanderWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::seekingWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

bool FlockBase::boundaryHandling

True if the the flock items have to be contained into the flock boundaries.

float FlockBase::pursuitingWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::pursuitMaxPredictionTime

Amount of time (in second) for future prediction. Used for the pursuiting behavior.

float FlockBase::avasioningWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::evasionMaxPredictionTime

Amount of time (in second) for future prediction. Used for the evasion behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

bool FlockBase::useAdditiveObstacleAvoidance

If this option is true the the obstacle avoidance is compounded with others behaviors. Otherwise, if false, the obstacle avoidance have the priority on others behaviors. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::obstacleAvoidanceMinTimeToCollision

Effect only uf FlockBase::useAdditiveObstacleAvoidance == false. Is the amount of time (in second) use to predict the future obstacle impact. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::obstacleAvoidanceWeight

Weight used for behavior compounding. Used for the wandering behavior. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::neighborsMaxRadius

Max neighboors sensing radius. Passed directly to the spactial database neighborood query. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

float FlockBase::maxSpeedBurst

Speed burst value on attacking. This value is part of flock configuration, read from config file.

SceneNode* FlockBase::targetNode

Used for the seeking behavior.

SteerableEntity* FlockBase::targetEntity

Used for the pursuiting behavior. This behavior needs the SteerableEntity reference instead of the SceneNode reference because the pursuiting behavior takes into account the target future position, calculated with speed, direction and position.

SteerableEntity* FlockBase::chaserEntity

Used for the evading behavior. This behavior needs the SteerableEntity, for the same reason expaned for FlockBase::targetEntity.

int FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateRangeSize

This is a fundamental parameter for the performance optimization.

On calling FlockBase::updateBehavior method is updated the behavior of flock items that satisfy this condition:

flockItems_index MOD FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateRangeSize == FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateCounter

where:

  • flockItems_index is the index of flock, it range in [ 0, FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateCounter [
  • FlockBase::interleaveUpdateCounter is the behavior index, it range in [ 0, FlockBase::mInterleavedUpdateRangeSize ]
